name: Eiro
description:
Become the hero of Eiro! Journey through a mystical land filled with dangerous enemies to discover your destiny and the source of the mysterious corruption! With mixing the fast paced action of bullet hells and the progression of an ARPG, players will be dodging and diving as they learn to master colour match ups, absorbing bullets and class specific skills.

Master combat and test your skills against powerful bosses along your journey, or use your skills to help citizens in need.

Music from https://incompetech.com/.
